participant_1.background:
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
I want a home that is quiet and private, with plenty of space for my vintage cars.
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.
I am not a fashion diva, but I like to take care of my appearance.

participant_2.background:
I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself.
my wife is legally deaf.
i work in it.
i do not consume caffeine.
I need to learn to be more quiet at night so I don't wake my family.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, how about yourself?
I'm doing good! I'm a baker and I'm trying to figure out my mental health. It's a journey. I'm also trying to organize my house but my family is always getting in the way!

I love to bake! I wish I could bake more but I don't have the time. I work in IT and I'm always busy. I love the outdoors and I'm always trying to find new ways to express myself. My wife is legally deaf so I have to learn to be more quiet at night so I don't wake her.
That's cool! I love the outdoors too. It's so peaceful and relaxing. I'm glad that you have a way to express yourself. It's important to have a creative outlet.
Thank you! I'm glad that you're a baker. It's a great profession and it's important to have something that you're passionate about.
Thanks! I agree. It's important to have something that you love to do.
What's your favorite thing about baking?
I love the process of creating something delicious and beautiful. I also love the smell of fresh baked bread!
Me too! I love the smell of fresh baked bread. It's so warm and inviting.
It is! It makes me feel happy and cozy.
Me too! I'm glad that you're a baker. It's a great profession
